title: Advanced Instructional Design Course for Integrated Learning Theory Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for professionals with extensive practical experience in science to strengthen theoretical integration and real-world application skills

learning_goals: An integrated framework can be developed to analyze interactions between learning theories.
An instructional design model can be developed to connect theory and practice in self-directed learning environments.
A theoretical model can be proposed to explain the linkage between learners' self-regulation processes and instructional design in science education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
